articles.title: Sri Lanka's President asks China to restructure debt repayments - Times of India
articles.description: South Asia News: Sri Lanka has benefited from billions of dollars in soft loans from China but the island nation is currently in the midst of a foreign exchange crisis
articles.content: Sri Lanka's President asks China to restructure debt repayments

articles.title: 'Be careful of your family's safety': Taiwanese actor Chen Ting gets death threat over TV role - AsiaOne

articles.title: How dangerous is 'flurona' – a Covid-19 and seasonal influenza infection – as Omicron spreads? - AsiaOne
